ALWAYS OVER THE WATER
Nothing more serious can happen to an Aeromarine
in flight than an enforced descent-and herein is one
of the great advantages of travel in flying boats-you
always, always have the necessary alighting space,
You fly only over the broad free spaces of the waters'
suriace.
This gives you the knowledge of 100 per
cent. safety when you take your flight.
Aeromarine Airways, Inc.
(Established 1920)
Largest Aerial Transportation Company in the
World Operating Flying Boats
Eleven Passenger Enclosed Cabin Air Cruisers
Six Seat Navy Open Cockpit Flying Boats
Executive Offices:
1800 TIMES BUILDING, NEW YORK
Phone Bryant 4505-6147
